draad164: Inline Supabase queries with fallback aggregation
draad165-corrected: SDK cache disabling - FIXED (removed broken custom headers)
draad165-method: HTTP cache headers + fresh client (custom X-* headers REMOVED)
notes: DRAAD165 CORRECTED: Removed custom X-Client-Cache-Buster and X-Request-Timestamp headers that were FORBIDDEN by Supabase SDK (caused TypeError: fetch failed). Solution: Fresh client per request + standard HTTP cache headers = guaranteed fresh data without breaking SDK.
